text: Fred Chase Koch (; September 23, 1900 â€“ November 17, 1967) was an American chemical engineer and entrepreneur who founded the oil refinery firm that later became Koch Industries, the second-largest privately held company in the United States. Koch was born in Quanah, Texas. He died in Bear River City, Utah. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Engineers from Utah Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Koch family Category:Republicans (United States) Category:American chemical engineers
title: Fred C. Koch
